articles.description: The Rangers boss and former club captain spoke honestly about the Egyptian forward who is in his fourth season at Liverpool
articles.content:
Steven Gerrard has predicted Mohamed Salah to go on and embarrass his Champions League goal record at Liverpool. 
On Tuesday, Salah scored Liverpool's third in their 5-0 rout of Atalanta.

articles.content:

articles.content:
